name: ShellHub
desc: Enables easy access any Linux device behind firewall and NAT

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable ShellHub Agent daemon.

options.name: keepAliveInterval
options.desc: Determine the interval to send the keep alive message to the server.This has a direct impact of the bandwidth used by the device.

options.name: preferredHostname
options.desc: Set the device preferred hostname. This provides a hint to the serverto use this as hostname if it is available.

options.name: privateKey
options.desc: Location where to store the ShellHub Agent private key.

options.name: server
options.desc: Server address of ShellHub Gateway to connect.

options.name: tenantId
options.desc: The tenant ID to use when connecting to the ShellHub Gateway.
